Uses of Package
xdi2.client

Packages that use xdi2.client
xdi2.client.http An XDI client that can send XDI messages via HTTP. 
xdi2.client.local An XDI client that can "send" XDI messages to local Graph objects. 
 

Classes in xdi2.client used by xdi2.client.http
XDIClient
          An XDIClient can send XDI message envelopes to an XDI endpoint, and retrieve the results.
 

Classes in xdi2.client used by xdi2.client.local
XDIClient
          An XDIClient can send XDI message envelopes to an XDI endpoint, and retrieve the results.
